author: matts
msg: Further cleanup of the provider relative file stuff.

author: matts
msg: AxKit.pm - Fix no styles + provider = provider results
Language/*.pm and Provider.pm - Changed all subrequests to "do the right thing" - i.e. get a subrequest to use for AxKit::Cfg and get the right provider for any subrequest.
LibXSLT.pm - Assume .xsl files are style providers and everything else is content. Lame, I know.
XPathScript.pm - Do the right thing when requesting an included stylesheet vs a document() wrt Provider->new_XXX_provider
ConfigReader.pm - better debugging of when get_config returns undef

author: matts
msg: Removed uses of $ENV{} since that won't be setup in fast_handler

author: matts
msg: For some reason we were losing $ENV{PATH_INFO}. This restores it.

author: matts
msg: Attempt to fix some of the weird gzip bugs
